DoubleTab & Source_Generique_P0_Elem::ajouter ( DoubleTab &  resu) const [virtual]

Implements Source_Generique_base.

Definition at line 42 of file Source_Generique_P0_Elem.cpp.

References Source_Generique_base::ch_source_, DoubleVect::echange_espace_virtuel(), la_zone, and Champ_Proto::valeurs().

{
  Champ espace_stockage;
  const Champ_base& champ_calc = ch_source_->get_champ(espace_stockage);
  const DoubleTab& valeurs_calc = champ_calc.valeurs();

  int nb_elem = la_zone->nb_elem();
  const DoubleVect& vol = la_zone->volumes();
  const DoubleVect& poro_vol = la_zone->porosite_elem();

  for (int elem = 0; elem<nb_elem; elem++)
    resu(elem) += valeurs_calc(elem)*vol(elem)*poro_vol(elem);

  resu.echange_espace_virtuel();
  return resu;
}
